entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:03 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:02 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:02 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
